00055 W.refresh = function(){
00056     var db = document.body;
00057     var tbs = this.body.style;
00058     if(window.innerWidth) {
00059         tbs.width = window.innerWidth +'px';
00060         tbs.height = window.innerHeight +'px';
00061     }else if(window.opera){
00062         tbs.width = db.clientWidth +'px';
00063         tbs.height = db.clientHeight +'px';
00064     }else{  // IE and others
00065         tbs.width = db.offsetWidth +'px';
00066         tbs.height = db.offsetHeight +'px';
00067     }
00068 };

00078 W.wednusify = function(obj){
00079     // minimal WPS object
00080     var tmp = {wps:'', core:{}, body:document.createElement('div')};
00081     // check missing elements
00082     // 1. check core
00083     if(obj.core == null){
00084         tmp.core = obj;
00085     }else tmp.core = obj.core;
00086     // 2. check body
00087     if(obj.body == null)
00088         tmp.body = document.createElement('div');
00089     // 3. check wps
00090     if(obj.wps != null){
00091         tmp.wps = obj.wps;
00092     }else{
00093         var coreStyle = tmp.core.style;
00094         tmp.wps = parseInt(coreStyle.width?coreStyle.width:100)
00095             +','+ parseInt(coreStyle.height?coreStyle.height:100)
00096             +',left:'+parseInt(coreStyle.left?coreStyle.left:100)
00097             +',top:'+ parseInt(coreStyle.top?coreStyle.top:100);
00098     }
00099     return tmp;
00100 };

00102 
00106 W.is_wednusified = function(obj){
00107     return (typeof obj.body == 'object') && (typeof obj.core == 'object')
00108         && (typeof obj.wps == 'string');
00109 };

00132 W.add = function(obj, parent){
00133     // support batch addition
00134     if(obj.constructor == Array){
00135         for(var i = 0; i < obj.length; ++i)
00136         this.add(obj[i], parent);
00137         return;
00138     }
00139 
00140     // check whether it is an WPS object
00141     if(!this.is_wednusified(obj))
00142         obj = this.wednusify(obj);
00143     // expand (HTML element) core
00144     if(obj.core.style != null){
00145         if(obj.core.style.width == '')
00146             obj.core.style.width = '100%';
00147         if(obj.core.style.height == '')
00148             obj.core.style.height = '100%';
00149     }
00150     // append core to body if it's appendable
00151     if(obj.core.appendChild != null && obj.body !== obj.core){
00152         obj.body.appendChild(obj.core);
00153     }
00154 
00155     // it's all about positioning.
00156     obj.body.style.position = 'absolute';
00157 
00158     // check whether it is an WPS object
00159     if(typeof parent != 'undefined'){
00160         if(!this.is_wednusified(parent)){
00161             parent  = this.add(parent);
00162             parent.children = [];
00163             parent.onresize = function(){W.repos(this);};
00164         }
00165     }else parent = W;
00166 
00167     // build hierarchy
00168     obj.parent = parent;
00169     parent.children[parent.children.length] = obj;
00170     // put the core into the body
00171     parent.body.appendChild(obj.body);
00172     this.repos(parent);
00173     return obj;
00174 };

00184 W.repos = function(parent){var self = this;
00185     // update workspace size props
00186     W.refresh();
00187     if(typeof parent == 'undefined')
00188         parent = W;
00189     var children = parent.children;
00190     for(var i = 0; i < children.length; ++i){
00191         wps(children[i]);
00192     }
00193 
00194     function wps(obj){
00195         var wps = obj.wps.split(',');
00196         var os = obj.body.style;
00197         var ps = obj.parent.body.style;
00198 
00199         // calculate relative size
00200         ps.scale_width = ps.wps_width?ps.wps_width:parseInt(ps.width);
00201         ps.scale_height = ps.wps_height?ps.wps_height:parseInt(ps.height);
00202 
00203         // resize relatively
00204         var tmp = wps[0].split('%');
00205         if(tmp.length == 2){
00206             os.width = getAbsSize(ps.scale_width, tmp[0]) +'px';
00207         }else os.width = parseInt(tmp[0]) +'px';
00208         tmp = wps[1].split('%');
00209         if(tmp.length == 2){
00210             os.height = getAbsSize(ps.scale_height, tmp[0]) +'px';
00211         }else os.height = parseInt(tmp[0]) +'px';
00212 
00213         // reposition relatively
00214         os.top = getpos(ps, obj, wps[3])+'px';
00215         os.left = getpos(ps, obj, wps[2])+'px';
00216 
00217         // relay wps event to children of this obj.
00218         if(obj.onresize)
00219             obj.onresize();
00220 
00221         function getAbsSize(ps, perc){
00222             return Math.floor(ps * (perc / 100));
00223         };
00224 
00232         function getpos(parent, obj, PosData){var offset = 0;
00233             if(typeof PosData == 'undefined') return;
00234             var s = obj.body.style;
00235             var pos = PosData.split(':');
00236             // get offset magnitude
00237             switch(pos[0]){
00238                 case 'top':
00239                     offset = parseInt(pos[1]);
00240                     break;
00241                 case 'ycenter':
00242                     offset = (parent.scale_height / 2) - (parseInt(s.height) / 2) + parseInt(pos[1]);
00243                     break;
00244                 case 'bottom':
00245                     offset = (parent.scale_height - parseInt(s.height)) + parseInt(pos[1]);
00246                     break;
00247                 case 'left':
00248                     offset = parseInt(pos[1]);
00249                     break;
00250                 case 'xcenter':
00251                     offset = (parent.scale_width / 2) - (parseInt(s.width) / 2) + parseInt(pos[1]);
00252                     break;
00253                 case 'right':
00254                     offset = parent.scale_width - parseInt(s.width) + parseInt(pos[1]);
00255             };
00256             offset = Math.round(offset);
00257             //if(isNaN(offset)) offset = 0;
00258             return offset;
00259         };
00260     };
00261 };

00270 W.scrollbar = function(value){
00271     document.body.style.overflow = value;
00272 };

00278 W.clear =function(){
00279     //document.write('<div id="_wednus_wps_" style="display:none;position:absolute;z-index:1;height:200px;overflow:scroll;">.</div>');
00280     document.write('<div id="_wednus_wps_" style="display:none;position:absolute;">.</div>');
00281     document.close();
00282 };

00286 // clear screen and ready the document.body
00287 W.clear();
00288 // remove scrollbars
00289 W.scrollbar('auto');
00290 // prepare Wednus object root
00291 document.body.appendChild(W.body);
00292 //W.event(window, 'onload', new Function('document.body.appendChild(W.body);'));
00293 W.event(window, 'onresize', W.repos);
